title: "Ansems" display caps with sketch lines
content:
I'm looking for this font (see attached), does anyone know what the name of this font is?

comments.content: It looks like someone bastardized ITC Usherwood.
I don't think I will find the exact font so I'll have to do it with the ITC Usherwood. Thanx for your reply.
